type.description: Type of losgistics object, e.g. air waybill, booking, etc

typeCode.description: Commonly useed codes for document type, e.g. jfwb, jfhl etc. Leave nlank if unknown

issuedBy.description: Internet of logistics identity code of issuing party.

key.description: JSON field name of code that identifies this logistics object, e.g. 'waybill number', 'UPID' etc.

WeightUnitCode.description: Weight unit code for the invoice

DimensionsUnitCode.description: Dimensions unit code for the invoice

VolumeUnitCode.description: Volume unit code for the invoice

ShipmentTypeCode.description: Total, part or split consignment indicator

LoadTypeCode.description: Bulk or containerized (BLK or ULD) indicator

DeckPosition.description: Position of the shipment in the aircraft - e.g. lower or main deck

ConsolDirectLCflag.description: Shipment type indicator - e.g. D for Direct, C for Consolidation or L for Letter of Credit

CustomsOriginCode.description: Customs transit status / information / reference / code

RatingTypeIndicator.description: Transportation rating type - e.g. F for Face, P for Published, or A for Actual Rating detail

WeightValuationCharges.description: Weight Valuation payment code - e.g. at origin (prepaid) or at destination (collect)

OtherCharges.description: Other Charges payment code - e.g. at origin (prepaid) or at destination (collect)

CodeIssuer.description: Issuer of location code - e.g. IATA, UN/LOCODE, ICAO…

Code.description: Location code of airport, freight terminal, seaport, rail station…

Type.description: Location type - e.g. Airport, FreightTerminal, RailStation, Other, Seaport…

LocationName.description: Full name of the location / facility

DockElevationMetric.description: Dock elevation in meters from building's ground level

DockApproachInfo.description: Dock approach information / direction for approach - e.g. entry from SouthWest

DockFloor.description: Floor number of building where dock is located

DockOtherInfo.description: Other dock information - e.g. access times, security id…

DocumentID.description: Reference number allocated to a consignment as per shipper / agent / issuing carrier agreement

DocumentIDAdditional.description: Additional shipment information that supplements the reference number

FreightForwarderReferenceNumber.description: Freight Forwarder reference used to identify a specific booking or file

OtherPartyReferenceNumber.description: Other party reference used to identify a specific booking or file

CustomsReferenceNumber.description: Unique identification number assigned by the Customs to the related invoice - e.g. UCR

DocumentName.description: Name of the referenced document - must correspond to DocumentType

BaseCurrency.description: Base or origin currency - ISO alpha 3 code

TargetCurrency.description: Target or destination currency - ISO alpha 3 code

ExchangeRateFor1BaseUnit.description: Amount of target currency for 1 unit of base currency - e.g. [amount in base currency] x [exchange rate] = [amount in target currency]

LegalRegistrationNumber.description: Company's legal registration number at the specified address

TaxID.description: Company's tax ID at the specified address

Issuer.description: Issuer of the company identifier - e.g. DUNS, ICAO...

Role.description: Other party's role - e.g. Consignor, Exporter, Manufacturer, Carrier, FreightForwarder, Consignee, Importer, Payer, Payee, ShipTo, ShipFrom, BillTo, BillFrom, RemitTo, RemitFrom, Shipper

ItemValue.description: Accounting information Item value - e.g PAYMENT BY CERTIFIED CHEQUE…

Code.description: Special handling code following IATA standards

Description.description: Special handling description following IATA standards

UPIDIssuer.description: Issuer of the UPID identifier - e.g. GS1…

UPID.description: Unique Piece Identifier for the piece / package - e.g. GS1 SSCC-18 code

ShippingMarks.description: Free text the marks and / or numbers shown on a piece / package / pallet / ULD

DocumentName.description: Name of the referenced document - must correspond to DocumentType

ContentDescription.description: General description of the piece contents (not a detailed description of products / items / articles contained within)

CustomsOriginCode.description: Customs transit status / information / reference / code

Code.description: Packaging type identifier as per UN.ECE Rec 20 Annex II

Description.description: Packaging type description as per UN.ECE Rec 20 Annex II

Type.description: Standard Unit Load Device type code

ATAdesignator.description: US / ATA Unit Load Device type code

LoadingIndicator.description: ULD height or loading limitation code

OwnerCodeIssuer.description: Issuer of the ULD owner code

OwnerCode.description: Owner code of the ULD in aa, an or na format - owner can be an airline or leasing company

Issuer.description: Issuer of the company identifier - e.g. DUNS, ICAO...

LocationName.description: Full name of the location / facility

Description.description: Contact description -  e.g. work, home, mobile phone, sales dept…

Issuer.description: Issuer of contact identifier - e.g. Skype, Whatsapp, Viber, Facebook…

SLAC.description: Shipper's Load And Count - number of individual pieces provided by the shipper (loose, palletized or in the ULD)

NetWeight.description: Net weight of the contents of the piece / package

TareWeight.description: Weight of empty packaging, pallet or ULD for the piece

GrossWeight.description: Total weight of piece / package / pallet / ULD

SequenceNumber.description: Sequence number of the movement for this piece

SpaceAllocationDetails.description: Space allocation request / action / confirmation code or details

DocumentName.description: Name of the referenced document - must correspond to DocumentType

GrossWeight.description: Gross weight of piece / package / ULD

Description.description: Generic text description of the goods

OriginCountryCode.description: Origin country ISO code of the goods

Issuer.description: Issuer of Harmonized Commodity codes - e.g. WCO…
Issuer of commodity classification codes - e.g. Brussels Tariff Nomenclature, EU Harmonized System Code, UN Standard...International Trade Classification

RatingTypeIndicator.description: Transportation rating type - e.g. F for Face, P for Published, or A for Actual Rating detail

RateClassCode.description: Commodity identifier on which the rate class code is applied

RCP.description: City code of Rate Combination Point (RCP), the point over which sector rates are combined

ULDRateClassType.description: Unit Load Device rate class type

RateClassCodeBasis.description: Basis on which the Rate Class Code is applicable

RateReferenceCode.description: A unique code to indicate the applicable rate

RateReferenceType.description: Type of rate - e.g. contract, adhoc, etc.

ItemTotalCharge.description: Total charge of for this line item

DocumentName.description: Name of the referenced document - must correspond to DocumentType

Issuer.description: Issuer of the product identifer - e.g. UPC, EAN, Amazon…
Issuer of the Commodity Code - e.g. Brussels Tariff Nomenclature, EU Harmonized System Code, UN Standard International Trade…
Issuer of the company identifier - e.g. DUNS, ICAO...

LocationName.description: Full name of the location / facility

Description.description: Contact description -  e.g. work, home, mobile phone, sales dept…

Issuer.description: Issuer of contact identifier - e.g. Skype, Whatsapp, Viber, Facebook…

Value.description: Product characteristic value / attribute - e.g. Blue…

UnitPrice.description: Product price per unit in the base currency

UnitCode.description: Unit code for item - e.g. piece, unit, kg, pack, hour, minute…

QuantityForUnitPrice.description: Product quantity for unit price - e.g. 12 (eggs for one USD 1)

SubTotalAmount.description: Product subtotal before discount and tax - CALCULATED: Quantity x UnitPrice / QuantityForUnitPrice

TotalDiscountAmount.description: Total discount amount - CALCULATED: Amount + OtherAmount

TotalTaxAmount.description: Tax amount - CALCULATED: BaseAmount x Percent

TotalAmount.description: Total line amount after discount and tax - CALCULATED: SubTotalAmount - TotalDiscountAmount + TotalTaxAmount

ItemQuantity.description: Item quantity - e.g. 1 for items with precise serial numbers (e.g. smartphones) or more for bulk items with quantity units in weight instead of items (e.g. tomatoes…)

SerialNumber.description: If applicable, individual product serial number for each product of the current line

Type.description: Identifier type or description - e.g. wifi mac address, bluetooth address…

ProductExpiryDate.description: Product expiry date - e.g. for perishables goods or goods with programmed obsolescence

Type.description: Movement type - e.g. Pre-Carriage, Main-Carriage or On-Carriage. Always defaults to Main-Carriage.

ModeCode.description: Mode of transport code following UNECE Recommendation N. 19 - Code for Modes of Transport

IATAairlinePrefix.description: IATA prefix number assigned to airline

CustomsSubjectCode.description: Customs subject code - e.g. IMP for import, EXP for export, AGT for Agent, ISS for The Regulated Agent Issuing the Security Status for a Consignment etc.  At least one of the three elements (Country Code, Information Identifier or Customs, Security and Regulatory Control Information Identifier) must be completed

CustomsContentCode.description: Customs content code - e.g. Item Number I, Exemption Legend L, System Downtime Reference S, Unique Consignment Reference Number U, Movement Reference Number M

SupplementaryCustomsInformation.description: Supplementary party or location information for customs reporting

PayingParty.description: Party covering the insurance - e.g. Consignor, Consignee, Freight Forwarder…

ID.description: Company's unique identifier at insurance company

AccountNumber.description: Company's account number at insurance company

LegalRegistrationNumber.description: Insurance company's legal registration number at the specified address

TaxID.description: Insurance company's tax ID at the specified address

Issuer.description: Issuer of the company identifier - e.g. DUNS, ICAO...

Description.description: Contact description -  e.g. work, home, mobile phone, sales dept…

Issuer.description: Issuer of contact identifier - e.g. Skype, Whatsapp, Viber, Facebook…

InsuredAmount.description: Insured amount - amount covered by the insurance policy

Charge.description: Insurance charge - e.g. amount billed by the insurance company for the insurance policy

LocationIndicator.description: Other Charge Location indicator - e.g. Origin (O) or Transit (T) or Destination(D)

DateTime.description: Special service scheduled date and time

ByTime.description: Amount of time for which the charge is applied

ByItemQuantity.description: Number of items for which the charge is applied

PrepaidCollectIndicator.description: Other Charges payment indicator - e.g. at origin (prepaid) or at destination (collect)

NoCarriageValue.description: NVD (No Value Declared) indicator when no value is declared for carriage

NoCustomsValue.description: NCV (No Customs Value) indicator when no value is declared for customs

NoInsuranceValue.description: XXX indicator when no value is declared for insurance

TotalOtherChargesDueAgent.description: Total charges due Agent / Forwarder amount
Total charges due Agent / Forwarder amount

TotalCharges.description: CALCULATED: Total Charges converted to destination currency as per CURRENCY conversion rate

TotalULDCount.description: Total count of Piece lines with ULD description

TotalNetWeight.description: Total goods net weight (sum of pieces net weight)

TotalTareWeight.description: Total tare weight (sum of pieces tare weight)

TotalGrossWeight.description: Total goods gross weight (sum of pieces gross weight)

TotalVolume.description: Total goods volume (sum of pieces volume)
